data.name: limHaloPT
data.description: The public repository of limHaloPT (master for the most recent version of the code)

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "The limHaloPT package calls various functions from [CLASS](https://github.com/lesgourg/class_public) Boltzman solver, including the matter power spectrum and transfer functions, growth factor etc. The"

"Welcom to limHaloPT, a peer-reviewed open source numerical package for computing the clustering and shot-noise contributions to the power spectrum of line intensity/temperature fluctuations within halo-model framework."
"To compile, within the main directory of limHaloPT, type: \"make\" ... This would create an executable called \"limHaloPT\" in the same directory, which you will use to run the code."
